title: bitcoiner24h
author: bitcoiner24h
created_time: September 09, 2023, 05:36:58 PMLast edit: January 18, 2024, 04:40:26 PM by bitcoiner24h
content: Selling my Kialara Soul of Satoshi, only considering serious offers. Please PM me with offers.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Pretty cool piece that went under the radar regarding Max's releases I think.Also something to notice: The color of the bar is actually quite silver-ish, in the photo it looks more like some valyrian steel.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Correct me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty.

comments.author: Box Guy
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece….

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Box Guy on September 20, 2023, 05:51:35 AMQuote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece…. CorrectThese came with kits that you could assemble them as a normal walletFun fact... when you unscrew the housing to take out the coin for assembly, the bar number should be written on the back of the artwork on the other side

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 20, 2023, 11:14:31 AMQuote from: Box Guy on September 20, 2023, 05:51:35 AMQuote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece…. CorrectThese came with kits that you could assemble them as a normal walletFun fact... when you unscrew the housing to take out the coin for assembly, the bar number should be written on the back of the artwork on the other sideVery interesting. Thank you

comments.author: Kialara
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 20, 2023, 11:14:31 AMQuote from: Box Guy on September 20, 2023, 05:51:35 AMQuote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece…. CorrectThese came with kits that you could assemble them as a normal walletFun fact... when you unscrew the housing to take out the coin for assembly, the bar number should be written on the back of the artwork on the other sideThanks, MJ. Yes these are signed and numbered on the reverse under an additional layer of glass. You can see more here: https://imgur.io/a/dWvI3

comments.author: bitcoiner24h
comments.body: Quote from: Kialara on September 24, 2023, 07:30:50 AMQuote from: minerjones on September 20, 2023, 11:14:31 AMQuote from: Box Guy on September 20, 2023, 05:51:35 AMQuote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece…. CorrectThese came with kits that you could assemble them as a normal walletFun fact... when you unscrew the housing to take out the coin for assembly, the bar number should be written on the back of the artwork on the other sideThanks, MJ. Yes these are signed and numbered on the reverse under an additional layer of glass. You can see more here: https://imgur.io/a/dWvI3Thank you for this additional information, both to MJ and Max!

comments.author: Box Guy
comments.body: Quote from: Kialara on September 24, 2023, 07:30:50 AMQuote from: minerjones on September 20, 2023, 11:14:31 AMQuote from: Box Guy on September 20, 2023, 05:51:35 AMQuote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 05:50:26 AMCorrect me if I’m wrong but this item does not have a wallet built into it does it ?  Ty. I believe its a DIY piece…. CorrectThese came with kits that you could assemble them as a normal walletFun fact... when you unscrew the housing to take out the coin for assembly, the bar number should be written on the back of the artwork on the other sideThanks, MJ. Yes these are signed and numbered on the reverse under an additional layer of glass. You can see more here: https://imgur.io/a/dWvI3Wow this link is really fucking cool. Great work documenting to show us Max. I enjoyed learning about the piece.

comments.author: bitcoiner24h
comments.body: Thank you for your comments, Kialara Soul of Satoshi still available

comments.author: bitcoiner24h
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoiner24h on September 09, 2023, 05:36:58 PMSelling my Kialara Soul of Satoshi, only considering serious offers. I'm open to using Minerjones as an escrow if needed, and the buyer covers the feesPlease PM me with offers.
